G

Game - Class in model
The game class which handles everything related to the Trash game
Game(int, Utente) - Constructor for class model.Game
The game constructor creates the class Giocatore which is used by the human player; then it's assigned to it the User which is the same between different games.
GameController - Class in model
Controller which handles the game class and view, as per the MVC pattern
GameView - Class in model
the game view class that shows everything related to the game to the user
